overview: Jimmy studied Computer Science at UmeÃ¥ University in Sweden, specializing in Mathematics and Algorithm Theory. He is an acknowledged algorithm expert, with outstanding programming competition merits, including: Winner of International Google Code Jam in 2003, highest ranked coder at TopCoder in 2002, three-time Swedish university programming champion and gold medalist at the International Olympiad in Informatics 1997. He was lead programmer of ‘FILA Decathlon’ for Nintendo Game Boy Advance (published by THQ in 2002).
